name: Chicken Bastilla (Pastilla)
steps: Cook the chicken with onions, salt and pepper until fully cooked, then shred the meat.
Toast the almonds, then roughly chop or grind them.
Beat the eggs and cook them with the shredded chicken, adding a bit of sugar and cinnamon to taste.
Take a pastry sheet, brush with butter or oil, place some filling in the center.
Fold the edges of the sheet to wrap the filling, place in a buttered or oiled baking dish.
Repeat until all filling is used; brush the top with melted butter.
Bake until the pastry is golden and crisp.
description: A sweet-savory Moroccan pastilla with shredded chicken, almonds and spices wrapped in crisp pastry.
